entries.journal_entry_description: Full-scale war demands armaments, and Lieutenant Pofko has ordered you to create a rocket launcher for the Imperial Army.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You have been tasked with creating a rocket launcher for the Imperial Army.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have completed the rocket launcher for the troops in Restuss and should return to Lieutenant Pofko with it.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Give the rocket launcher to the load lifter droid.
